post.description: Reviews a user's access to a resource
Screens a user by account user name.

Returns the list of identifiers of the resources that an account can
perform the specified action upon.
Reviews a user's access to a resource

account_username.description: Defines the username of the account of which access is being reviewed

cluster_id.description: Indicates which Cluster the resource type belongs to

organization_id.description: Indicates which Organization the resource type belongs to

resource_type.description:
Indicates the type of the resource an action would be taken on.
See uhc-account-manager/openapi/openapi.yaml for a list of possible values

subscription_id.description: Indicates which Subscription the resource type belongs to

AccessReviewResponse.description: Representation of an access review response

account_username.description: Defines the username of the account of which access is being reviewed

allowed.description: Defines whether the action on the specified resource type is allowed

cluster_id.description: Indicates which Cluster the resource type belongs to

organization_id.description: Indicates which Organization the resource type belongs to

resource_type.description:
Indicates the type of the resource an action would be taken on.
See uhc-account-manager/openapi/openapi.yaml for a list of possible values

subscription_id.description: Indicates which Subscription the resource type belongs to

ResourceReview.description: Contains the result of performing a resource access review.

account_username.description: Name of the account that is trying to perform the access.

action.description: Action that will the user is trying to perform.

cluster_ids.description: Identifiers of the clusters that the user has permission to perform the action upon.

organization_ids.description:
Identifiers of the organizations that the user has permissions to perform the action
upon.

subscription_ids.description: Identifiers of the subscriptions that the user has permission to perform the action upon.

ResourceReviewRequest.description: Request to perform a resource access review.

account_username.description: Name of the account that is trying to access the resource.

action.description: Action that will be performed on the resource.

SelfAccessReviewRequest.description: Representation of an access review performed against oneself

cluster_id.description: Indicates which Cluster the resource type belongs to

organization_id.description: Indicates which Organization the resource type belongs to

resource_type.description:
Indicates the type of the resource an action would be taken on.
See uhc-account-manager/openapi/openapi.yaml for a list of possible values

subscription_id.description: Indicates which Subscription the resource type belongs to

SelfAccessReviewResponse.description: Representation of an access review response, performed against oneself

allowed.description: Defines whether the action on the specified resource type is allowed

cluster_id.description: Indicates which Cluster the resource type belongs to

organization_id.description: Indicates which Organization the resource type belongs to

resource_type.description:
Indicates the type of the resource an action would be taken on.
See uhc-account-manager/openapi/openapi.yaml for a list of possible values

subscription_id.description: Indicates which Subscription the resource type belongs to

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will always be 'Error'

code.description: Globally unique code of the error, composed of the unique identifier of the API and the numeric identifier of the error. For example, for if the numeric identifier of the error is `93` and the identifier of the API is `clusters_mgmt` then the code will be `CLUSTERS-MGMT-93`.

reason.description: Human readable description of the error.
